description: Stabbed in the abdomen by Tomohiko Gōryoku during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Decapitated by his own chainsaw after being pushed by Hajime Hinata during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Impaled by several spears in a trap set up by Junko Enoshima, after being lured there by Chisa Yukizome
Stabbed herself due to watching the Suicide Video set up by Kazuo Tengan
Cleaved by Suzuko Kashiki during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Injected by a lethal poison during the Final Killing Game orchestrated by Kazuo Tengan after witnessing violence by Juzo Sakakura
Stabbed himself in the eye after watching the Suicide Video set up by Kazuo Tengan
Fatally wounded by Kyosuke Munakata during the Final Killing Game orchestrated by Kazuo Tengan
Stabbed by Asukasei Hino during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Throat slashed by Kyosuke Munakata
Stabbed in the abdomen by Sōsuke Ichino during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Injected by a lethal poison during the Final Killing Game orchestrated by Kazuo Tengan after willingly breaking his NG code
Shot by Mukuro Ikusaba
Murdered by Monaca Towa
Bludgeoned on the head by Sato with a sand-filled swimsuit
Died during the Tragedy
Swallowed her poisonous candies after watching the Suicide Video set up by Kazuo Tengan
Impaled on a katana by Karen Kisaragi after being pushed by Sōsuke Ichino during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Bludgeoned with a bat by Fuyuhiko Kuzuryu
Stabbed herself in the heart after watching the Suicide Video set up by Kazuo Tengan
Beaten with a chair by Daiki Kubo during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Injected by a lethal poison during the Final Killing Game orchestrated by Kazuo Tengan after being fed candy by Ruruka Ando
Shot in the throat by Asukasei Hino during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Chainsawed by Karen Kisaragi during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Impaled from behind by Sōsuke Ichino during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Stabbed multiple times by Asukasei Hino during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
Impaled with a spear by Sōsuke Ichino during the Tragedy of Hope's Peak Academy orchestrated by Junko Enoshima
